description:
Big Osaka`s Higo Ryusuke and Okino Yoko`s passionate romance makes the news. Yoko fan Kogoro, Conan, and Higo fan Haibara decide to investigate if the news is true. Higo and Yoko were meeting at a restaurant run by Higo`s senior Asuka. The sommelier Yamada, waiter Konoe, and waitress Reiko search for Asuka who hasn`t yet returned but are unable to find him. Meanwhile, Hgio and Yoko discover Asuka`s body in the storeroom. Inspector Megure suspects Higo and Yoko who discovered the body, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Suspects Are a Passionate Couple (Part 1)
容疑者は熱愛カップル (前編)
